column4: ok guys this is VERY odd.  My boss can open PDF and Word Docs on his machine which runs the same versions of the OpenOffice and Document Viewer.  We are also on the same kernel version, however I cannot seem to open any documents he sends me.  He is running 10.04 and I am running 10.10 any issues you might know about with this?
the word doc and pdf were both made in windows, but that would not explain why he can open the documents on his 10.04.2 and I cannot on 10.10
stay away from xchat-gnome it is the same as xchat just very limited features
